dublin_core.dcvalue: Interactive Session Open Source eMRS Want to learn more practical methods to deploying a sustainable EMR in a low resources facility This is your session Presented as an interactive session various processes involved in deploying an open source electronic medical record system will be demonstrated including how to mitigate for challenges such as lack of electricity low ICT skills of staff and incomplete documentation This session will also feature a family planning dashboard which has been used to expand LARC access in Nigeria With a bit of role play you ll learn approaches to institutionalize a dashboard to increase data use Presented by Benjamin Akinmoyeje ICTD IT Manager MSH Nigeria
OPENMRS Implementation: Implementing Opensource EMR in Low Resource Environment
